name: proposal-temporal
description: Provides standard objects and functions for working with dates and times.

scripts.test: cd polyfill && npm install && npm test && npm run cookbook && npm run test262 && cd ..
scripts.codecov:tests: cd polyfill && npm install && npm run codecov:tests && cd ..
scripts.codecov:test262: cd polyfill && npm install && npm run codecov:test262 && cd ..
scripts.test-cookbook: cd polyfill && npm install && npm run test-cookbook && cd ..
scripts.test262: cd polyfill && npm install && npm run test262
scripts.build:polyfill: cd polyfill && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:javascript: npm run build:polyfill && cd docs && npm install && npm run build:javascript && cd .. && cp docs/playground.js docs/playground.js.map out/docs/
scripts.build:docs: cd docs && npm install && npm run build:html && cd .. && cp docs/*.html docs/*.css docs/mermaid.js out/docs/ && cp -r docs/assets out/docs/
scripts.build: npm run build:javascript && npm run build:docs && npm run build:spec
